text: Vladimir Iosifovich Resin (; ; born 21 February 1936) is a Russian politician. He was the acting mayor of Moscow, appointed by Russian president Dmitry Medvedev to replace Yury Luzhkov on 28 September 2010. Resin was the first deputy mayor under Luzhkov.Moscow City Government. Vladimir Iosifovich Resin ==References== Category:1936 births Category:Living people Category:Mayors of Moscow
title: Vladimir Resin
